source.name: Adoption and Child Custody Advocacy--2008 Adoptive Adoption Investigation Data
source.description: The department is court ordered to complete a home investigation to determine if potential adoptive family whom is seeking permanency is suitable for placement.  This data represents the number of investigations undertaken by this office in 2008
